Description:
Quick update this week again.

https://azure.status.microsoft/en-us/status/history/ to see the incident reports re AFD.

🔎 Looking for content on a particular topic? Search the channel. If I have something it will be there! 🤔 Due to the channel growth and number of people wanting help I no longer can answer or even read questions and they will just stay in the moderation queue never to be seen so please post questions to other sites like Reddit, Microsoft Community Hub etc.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ C H A P T E R S ⏰ ▬▬▬▬▬▬ 00:00 - Introduction 00:31 - New videos 01:07 - RHEL software reservations 01:28 - Azure Functions Node.js 20 retire 01:40 - Azure Functions zero-downtime deployment 02:08 - AFD WAF CAPTCHA challenge 02:45 - AFD signed request 03:12 - AFD outage 10/29 07:21 - High scale private endpoints 07:48 - ASM NFS share to AFS migration 08:01 - Instant access snapshots 08:41 - PgBouncer 1.23.1 PostgreSQL flexible 08:59 - Azure ML preview feature retirements 09:26 - Close
